definition[0]: thin pieces of the stems of plants, used for making furniture and baskets
definition[1]: a long thin stick made from the stem of a plant, used for supporting other plants in a garden
definition[2]: a long thin stick with a curved handle that you can use to help you walk
definition[3]: a stick that was used in the past by teachers to hit children with as a punishment
example[2]: Children knew that if they misbehaved they would get the cane.
definition[4]: to punish someone, especially a child, by hitting them with a stick
